description: Ribbon-leaf Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum 'Atrolineare') is a stunningly beautiful specimen of maple tree. It features delicate, ribboned-shaped leaves that create a cascading, lacy effect. The leaves emerge bright-green in the spring and then deepen to a majestic dark purple for the summer months. It is quite tolerant of different conditions and makes an excellent choice for small gardens and as a potted plant. Additionally, its slow growth makes it easy to maintain and it shows off its stunning range of colors throughout the season. Perfect for adding drama to the garden, Ribbon-leaf Japanese Maple is a must-have for the avid gardener!
